entries.meaning: (computing) A (possibly zero-length) string of characters that is contained in another string.

verbs.description: substring (third-person singular simple present substrings, present participle substringing, simple past and past participle substringed)

entries.meaning: (computing, transitive) To extract a substring from.
examples: If an existing character-based column is increased in size and your program does not need the extra characters, the view can be changed to force the smaller size by substringing the existing column.

entries.meaning: (computing, transitive) To take as a substring.
